{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10093v1", "title": "Gradient modelling of memristive systems", "summary": "We introduce a gradient modeling framework for memristive systems. Our focus
is on memristive systems as they appear in neurophysiology and neuromorphic
systems. Revisiting the original definition of Chua, we regard memristive
elements as gradient operators of quadratic functionals with respect to a
metric determined by the memristance. We explore the consequences of gradient
properties for the analysis and design of neuromorphic circuits.", "main_category": "eess.SY", "categories": "eess.SY,cs.SY,math.DG,math.DS", "published": "2025-04-14T10:56:51Z"}
